content.question: A person is standing on a skateboard that is initially at rest, as shown. The person and the skateboard have a combined mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math>. The person then exerts an average horizontal force of magnitude <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> on the skateboard over a distance <math alttext="delta x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>x</mi></math>. The person and skateboard then travel up a ramp until they reach a flat section at height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>. Frictional forces are negligible. Which of the following comparisons must be true?

choices.label: <math alttext="F delta x equals m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></math>
<math alttext="F delta x is greater than m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></math>

<math alttext="one half m v squared equals m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half m v squared is greater than m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>></mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F delta x is greater than m g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
